widget.label: Element: Box Image
widget.description: Element show box image + text, or text + image

parameter.label: ves/pagebuilder/element/element-box-image.png
parameter.description: Box Image Element

parameter.name: addition_cls
parameter.label: Addition Class
parameter.description: This class is used to make owner style for the widget.

parameter.name: box_title
parameter.label: Box Title
parameter.description: Box Title.

parameter.name: box_title_link
parameter.label: Box Title Link
parameter.description: Box Title Link. Empty not use.

parameter.name: content
parameter.label: Box Text
parameter.description: Input html content.

parameter.name: box_button_text
parameter.label: Box Button Text
parameter.description: Box Button Text.

parameter.name: box_button_link
parameter.label: Box Button Link
parameter.description: Box Button Link. Empty not use.

parameter.name: button_style
parameter.label: Button Color Style
parameter.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes.

parameter.name: button_size
parameter.label: Button Size
parameter.description: These classes are bootstrap typo contextual color classes.

parameter.name: is_outline
parameter.label: Is Outline Button
parameter.description: Default should be No

parameter.name: is_active
parameter.label: Is Active Button
parameter.description: Default should be No

parameter.name: button_icon
parameter.label: Button Icon
parameter.description:
Button icon. You can input Font Awesome Icon at here. For example: fa fa-home
More information font awesome icon at here: https://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/

parameter.name: file
parameter.label: Box Image File
parameter.description:
Enter image path or use holder image (ex: holder.js/300x200). Or input image name with path.
Example: image_name.jpg(png|gif|jpeg|svg) or subfolder/image_name.jpg(png|gif|jpeg|svg).The "subfolder" is child folder in your_webroot_folder/pub/media/

parameter.name: image_size
parameter.label: Box Image size
parameter.description: Enter image size. Example: thumbnail, medium, large, full or other sizes defined by current theme. Alternatively enter image size in pixels: 200x100 (Width x Height). Leave empty to use 'thumbnail' size.

parameter.name: image_alt
parameter.label: Box Image Alt Text
parameter.description: Box Image Alt Text. Empty not use.

parameter.name: box_image_link
parameter.label: Box Image Link
parameter.description: Box Image Link. Empty not use.

parameter.name: box_image_bottom_text
parameter.label: Box Image Bottom Text
parameter.description: Box Image Bottom Text. Empty not use.

parameter.name: box_image_border_size
parameter.label: Box Image Border Size
parameter.description: Box Image Border Size (px, em, rem). Empty not use.

parameter.name: box_image_border_color
parameter.label: Box Image Border Color
parameter.description: Box Image Border Color (Hexa code, eg: #f0f0f0). Empty not use.

parameter.name: box_image_border_radius
parameter.label: Box Image Border Radius
parameter.description: Box Image Border Radius value (px or em, rem). Empty not use.
